content: You are Antonio. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Domenico., Domenico just said to you: '"Ah, grazie, Antonio! Much appreciated."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Domenico. Glad to be of service."

You are Antonio. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Domenico., Domenico just said to you: '"Ah, grazie, Antonio! That's a relief - good to have that sorted."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Domenico! Glad to have it taken care of. Carry on!"
